thread.title: Foxy Brown Adds Her 2 Cents To Nicki Minaj Remy Ma Beef
thread.title_full: Foxy Brown Adds Her 2 Cents To Nicki Minaj Remy Ma Beef

author: Cherise Johnson
title: Foxy Brown Adds Her 2 Cents To Nicki Minaj Remy Ma Beef
text:
5 Among the many things Remy Ma included in her Nicki Minaj diss track “SHETHER, ” a vicious slight at Foxy Brown’s loss of hearing and rumored tale that Jay Z gave her gonorrhea, was also embedded in the song meant for The Pinkprint rapper. “Talkin’ shit about me to a deaf bitch,” Remy spit on the track, “And usually I have sympathy for the impaired / But not when you hard of hearin’ from untreated gonorrhea.” A fan who took notice of the line came to both Nicki Minaj and Foxy Brown ’s defense on Instagram, noting that “SHETHER” wasn’t a real diss track and it sounded like a Wendy Williams interview. Foxy Brown seemed to agree as she added her thoughts to the whole situation with a kiss emoji. “I don’t battle tho I #bodybag,” she replied to another fan. 

It’s clear Fox Boogie is not here for whatever Remy Ma has to say about her and naturally, she’d take the side of her Trinidadian sister.
